CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Office Properties Income Trust is a real estate investment trust (REIT). The Company is focused on acquiring, owning, developing and leasing office and mixed-use properties in United States markets. Its primary investment objectives include acquiring properties or portfolios that enhance its overall portfolio composition and produce greater returns than those properties or portfolios the Company is disposing in connection with its capital recycling program. Its wholly owned properties comprised of approximately 160 properties located in 30 states and the District of Columbia, containing approximately 21.0 million rentable square feet. Its properties include 445 Jan Davis Drive, 131 Clayton Street, 4344 Carmichael Road, 15451 North 28th Avenue, 16001 North 28th Avenue, 711 S 14th Avenue, Regents Center, Campbell Place, Folsom Corporate Center, Bayside Technology Park, 10949 N. Mather Boulevard, 9815 Goethe Road, Capitol Place, 801 K Street and 11020 Sun Center Drive.
